item.title: Ultimate body paint compilation video - MCroft07
item.description:
Part 1 (can only upload up to 180 seconds)
Part 2. Real talk: I know a lot of you guys thought the girl in the maneskin video was me, but it is not, so I thought last year why not start making my own compilation video full of my own paints! Since then gosh, we have had imgur flip turned upside down. I've been working on this throughout because I thought the imgur community would love to see it and was desperately trying so hard to get back on the website (UK) because I knew I was nearly finished with it and I HAD to post it here. Recently there has been an influx of kindness in my comments after I expressed how sad and tired I was from all the gross incels, so thank you for turning up for me and making me feel like I'm more than a piece of sexual meat. To the men who still comment that stuff, literally go fuck yourself you genetic embarrassment. I'll put the FAQ here for old times sake. ............................................................................. I AM IN THE UK AND HAVE BEEN BLOCKED FROM USING IMGUR!!! I managed to get on here with a VPN but Imgur doesn't like Vpns so I might lose access again soon. Basically, every time I post is a day I can get on here. Thank you so much to those people who want to try and help me with private VPNs but I have really bad tech aura and I break a lot of things so this is truly the best way forward, also I'm scared of being told off for spamming on here haha. IF you still want to follow me and see what I am doing please PLEASE find me on https://linktr.ee/mcroft07?utm_source=linktree_profile_share I HATE THE GOVERNMENTS TOO Faq: I use body paint and do these in a mirror No, it is not AI I just looked at an anatomical drawing of a skeleton and copied it I use professional body paint covers (pasties) this means I am not wearing a top but I am also not naked. I paint myself, I make the props myself, I film myself, and I also edit. This is my full time thing now (yayy) I paint these by looking in a mirror, with brushes, and paint It takes between 6-12 hours each Body painting myself is my hobby/passion I do own clothes It doesn’t tickle “Why don’t you just wear clothes” once again, body painting myself is my hobby/passion. I am painting my skin, I am not wearing a suit - but that does not mean I am naked. I know, even I think this is a ridiculous set of questions I have to constantly answer I did not go to art school, I am self taught. Talent gets you so far, but this is a learned skill. The paint isn’t edible (gross) I've been painting myself for 16 years. The 07 does not mean I was born in 2007, UK 7 is my shoe size No, I don't need help painting my back, I don't want to paint my back, I don't need to paint my back. (also gross) No, I don't need help washing it off. (also you are gross) If you want to see more I am MCroft07 on IG, twitter, Tiktok, YouTube I paint them live on twitch I like doing the lip syncs, they're fun for me while I paint them. I couldn’t care less if you think they’re cringe. I am cringe but I am free My tattoos on my ribs are from Tomb Raider - I am a big TR fan I do not have an OF but if you want to send me money THAT badly you can just tip my twitch account. Haha. The shower afterwards takes about 15 minutes, I use a regular sponge and shower gel. The reason why it can look different at the end is because I am wearing a wig, I promise you it is not a different person because the hair changed. While on this topic, if my eyes change colour it’s because I am wearing contact lenses. (Those with an IQ above 10… I know. Even I’m shocked the wig thing is a frequent comment). I use body paint. It doesn’t tickle, I am very ticklish and this is fine. I don’t have an allergic reaction to the paint, but if you do it, you should always do a patch test first I do not know where you can buy body paint in every country. I know in the UK it is available at FacePaintingshop.com. I use a plethora of different brands, it’s best to search for them yourself online. I don’t work in Hollywood, I don’t want to. I just want to improve my body painting for myself. I am English, not American. I do not go outside like this to scare people. 1, that would be very cold. 2, in this current age, everyone would take photos without me knowing and it would likely dox me :)))))) I’m not a sweaty person, but if I was this would be a lot more difficult. Thank you to those of you who came from Imgur to my Twitch channel! “What’s the point in painting yourself when you can wear clothes?” all my clothes are in the laundry, had to resort to this, tough life It would not be quicker to jump into a pool of paint - think of the drying time?! Really proud of myself because I just bought a cheap top from Vinted and it was too small so I changed the back from a zipper to a corset style top to make it bigger to fit me and it worked! My secondary school textiles teacher would be proud of me! I don’t care that I wash it off at the end, I get to reuse this canvas, we love a reduce, reuse, recycle queen. I am not the lady who did the Maneskin video, it’s a cool video and she slayed, but it isn’t me. I can promise you there is not *a man* painting these and I am pretending to paint myself. I am genuinely painting myself. I know a lot of you don’t like reading this faq because it is horrid to see that I have to answer all of these. Unfortunately I have noticed that when I don’t put in all the icky things then I get more gross comments and I just have to spend more time blocking people so it’s better to call it out. I just copy and paste it each time anyway.
item.dc:creator: MCroft07

item.title: How could Gen Z do this to the economy?
item.description: Fuck WSJ, I’m not digging up the source or archive version of this borderline bait article. No one has any fucking money. Inflation hit everyone like a 7 iron to the head, not to mention the tariff roulette of this year. With no reasonable or predictable economic policy by the current administration, consumers are doing what they can to shield themselves from the incoming economic crash, saving money and/or deferring purchases.

item.title: Back from my suspension
item.description: I got temp banned for posting an ad that imgur was plastering all over my imgur homepage. Apparently their ad broke their community guidelines, and I should have know better than to post the content they were posting. Also now imgur sets off my anti virus soooo.. that's fun I guess. Merry Christmas everyone! I say party like it's Imgur's last Christmas, I'm not so sure we'll last till next year's. https://www.instagram.com/whimsington

item.title: Tuesday Phone Clearing DUMP (Mostly GAMING Memes & other geeky shit) #821
item.description:
1. Casuals: "Yes please, take more of my money!" :(
2. That is some hardcore BS right there :D
3. How it feels when a player picks up more ammo during a gunfight :D
4. If Harry Potter was written by a Texan
5. Meh... better to leave them with doubt and theories then showing them the real thing that is BELIEVE ME SO SO BAD that any one person can actually imagine
6. Ohhh
7. As a former child, I can confirm
8. Giving the second controller to your little sister
9. Me when that one game that has been on my wishlist forever finally is on sale for 90%
10. Damn, Dad that's crazy
11. Question for the girl gamers in our audience - what game makes you feel nostalgic :(
12. Why indeed
13. Parrot playing Elden Ring
14
15. Thanks for making it to end of the dump. I have a little announcement: you can now playtest my psychological horror/moral choice game based on The Milgram Experiment. I'm looking for people to play it and give me feedback! To do so simply go to the Steam page and click "Request Access". You will be notified when you can test the game! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2719670/The_Milgram_Experiment/

item.title: War approaches. I hope we’re ready
item.description: Beneath the weight of vanished years, Where love and life dissolve in tears, A hollowed heart, bereft, alone, Wanders lost through realms unknown. The whispers fade no laughter's hue, No smile to break the endless blue. A fragile soul, undone by time, Sinks slow within a silent rhyme. Gone the warmth of morning light, Replaced by cold and endless night. Each step feels drawn through heavy air, A dance of shadows, bleak despair. The icy touch of death’s soft breath, A quiet promise found in death. Yet shadows dance in dimming light, Between despair and fragile flight. No refuge found in open skies, No solace in familiar eyes. The world turns on, indifferent, vast, A ghost adrift, unmoored from past. In broken echoes, sorrow sings, Of vanished hopes and clipped wings. Still, within the aching night, A tender sorrow holds the light. Though silence drapes the fading day, A whispered hope may find its way. Between the dark and dawn’s embrace, A fragile pulse, a saving grace. —————————————————————I wish I’d never recovered from cancer. Four times…. Four times and I’m still left to suffer. What more could I possibly lose. What else is there to take from me. Point, laugh, mock me. I’ll still be here, waiting for more. There is nothing I have that I wouldn’t give to be gone. Everyone and everything is gone.
item.dc:creator: LedsenPotatis

item.title: I don’t argue with people John Brown would have shot
item.description:
https://bsky.app/profile/reformandrevolution.org/post/3m6zbc5wqwc2r
John Brown (May 9, 1800 – December 2, 1859) was an American abolitionist in the decades preceding the Civil War. First reaching national prominence in the 1850s for his radical abolitionism and fighting in Bleeding Kansas, Brown was captured, tried, and executed by the Commonwealth of Virginia for a raid and incitement of a slave rebellion at Harpers Ferry, Virginia, in 1859 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Brown_(abolitionist)?wprov=sfti1# (Don’t know where the quote in the title is from)

item.title: Return of the Meme: 1543 (womp²)
item.description:
Let's get this bread.
Hahahahhaha
Yuuuuuuupppp
Sorry for forgetting to crop today, but I really have no fucks left to give right now, they've migrated south like the Cranes.
I am a guy, but I would also like this.
Pippin tax Today's message from Pippin: "Ohmygawd good morning peekaboo." ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin 6) there is now a discord: https://discord.gg/rXqyS3te
item.dc:creator: CodyBurkett
